name: react-online-store
description: A template for an e-commerce application/website, made with React!

scripts.install: npm install && npm run i-client && npm run i-server && npm run i-db
scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run server-dev" "npm run client-dev" " npm run mongo"
scripts.server-dev: cd ./recom-backend && cross-env JWT_SECRET=abc DB_URI="mongodb://the_username:the_password@localhost:27017/store" npm run dev
